document.full_text: european happiness with the death of osama bin laden was tempered on wednesday by details showing he was unarmed when shot dead and qualms about whether torture of prisoners helped u.s. forces track him down.
document.title: european discomfort grows about bin laden killing
lines_and_colors: european happiness with the death of osama bin laden was tempered on wednesday by details showing he was unarmed when shot dead and qualms about whether torture of prisoners helped u.s. forces track him down.
